name: School Matching Recommendation AI
description: Get personalized school recommendations based on your academic profile, experiences, and preferences.
features: Analyzes GPA, MCAT, and other academic metrics
Considers extracurricular activities and experiences
Compares your profile with admitted student data
Provides match probability estimates
Suggests a balanced list of reach, target, and safety schools

name: "Are You Ready to Apply?" Checklist AI
description: Evaluate your application readiness and identify areas that need improvement before applying.
features: Comprehensive application readiness assessment
Identifies specific weaknesses in your profile
Creates a timeline for addressing gaps
Provides concrete action items to strengthen your application
Tracks progress toward application readiness
Recommends when you're ready to submit applications

name: Personal Med School Advisor AI
description: Track deadlines, organize tasks, and receive guidance throughout your application process.
features: Sends deadline reminders and alerts
Organizes application timeline with customizable tasks
Answers common application questions
Tracks your application progress
Recommends resources for different application components
Adapts to your specific schedule and needs

name: Personal Statement Brainstormer AI
description: Generate ideas and outline your personal statement based on your experiences and aspirations.
features: Analyzes your experiences to identify compelling stories
Helps articulate your unique motivations for medicine
Provides structural templates and organizational strategies
Offers writing style guidance appropriate for medical school essays
Breaks down the writing process into manageable steps
Focuses on themes relevant to medical school admissions

name: Primary Application Essay Drafter and Editor AI
description: Draft, structure, and refine your personal statement and work/activities descriptions for primary applications.
features: Helps organize your thoughts and experiences
Provides feedback on essay structure and content
Checks for grammar and writing style issues
Compares your essay to successful examples
Saves multiple versions for comparison
Ensures alignment with school-specific values

name: Secondary Application Essay Drafter and Editor AI
description: Create customized responses for different schools' secondary application prompts efficiently.
features: Analyzes secondary prompt requirements
Generates tailored content for specific schools
Customizes similar content for different prompts
Ensures consistency with your primary application
Identifies grammar and style issues
Organizes secondary responses by school

name: Interview Preparation Advisor and Mock Interviewer AI
description: Practice interview questions and receive feedback to improve your interview skills.
features: Simulates traditional and MMI interview formats
Prepares school-specific interview questions
Provides feedback on communication habits
Offers specific improvement suggestions
Tracks progress over multiple practice sessions
Focuses on challenging question types

name: Letter of Intent & Interest Generator AI
description: Create professional letters to communicate continued interest in schools after interviews.
features: Provides letter templates for different situations
Helps align your message with school missions
Guides appropriate professional tone
Suggests relevant updates to include
Polishes writing for clarity and professionalism
Manages different letter versions for multiple schools

name: Admissions Offer Negotiator & Decision-Making AI
description: Compare offers and get guidance on school selection and financial aid considerations.
features: Side-by-side comparison of offers
Financial aid package analysis
Assistance with professional communication for additional support
Long-term financial impact calculations
School fit evaluation beyond rankings
Decision deadline tracking

name: Reapplication Strategy AI
description: Create a strategic plan to strengthen your application for the next cycle if you need to reapply.
features: Analysis of application weaknesses
Personalized improvement plan
Gap year activity recommendations
Timeline for reapplication
School selection strategy for reapplicants
Guidance for addressing previous application issues
